featured.text: When subjected to repeated pressurization high in the sky, the four corners on a square window may 19 .

definition.zh_def: 加壓，指在封閉空間內增加氣體或液體的壓力。
definition.en_def: The process of increasing the pressure of a gas or liquid within a closed system.
definition.example: The pressurization of the cabin is essential for passenger comfort during the flight.
